required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Hetrombopag on the Pharmacokinetics of Rosuvastatin in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Open, Single-dose, Self-control Study to Investigate the Effect of Hetrombopag on the Pharmacokinetics of Rosuvastatin in Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects.

brief_summary.textblock: Effect of hetrombopag on the pharmacokinetics of rosuvastatin in healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of hetrombopag on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese adult subjects after oral administration of rosuvastatin calcium tablets. The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of rosuvastatin alone and when co-administered with hetrombopag.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: rosuvastatin alone and then in combination with hetrombopag

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the plasma concentration vs time curve (AUC0-72)
Area under the blood concentration vs time curve (AUC0-inf)

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of volunteers with adverse events as a measure of safety and tolerability

arm_group.description: rosuvastatin alone and then in combination with hetrombopag

intervention.description: Single oral dose of rosuvastatin on Day 1 or co-administered with hetrombopag on Day 11.
7.5 mg hetrombopag was administered on Day 6 to Day 11.

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai General Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
